name: Cog Eye
description:
My submission to the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Use the arrow keys and Enter to navigate the UI.

The goal is to get all of the "Cog Riders" to the goal by connecting cogs together. Please let me know what you think!

The source for this game and the engine I wrote for it can be found here: https://github.com/Bounty556/CogEye/

BGM Forest Walk by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/ Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
